name: CAGradientLayer
desc: A layer that draws a color gradient over its background color, filling the shape of the layer (including rounded corners)

items.name: var colors: [Any]?
items.desc: An array of CGColorRef objects defining the color of each gradient stop. Animatable.

items.name: var locations: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: An optional array of NSNumber objects defining the location of each gradient stop. Animatable.

items.name: var endPoint: CGPoint
items.desc: The end point of the gradient when drawn in the layer’s coordinate space. Animatable.

items.name: var startPoint: CGPoint
items.desc: The start point of the gradient when drawn in the layer’s coordinate space. Animatable.

items.name: var type: CAGradientLayerType
items.desc: Style of gradient drawn by the layer.
